question:
Given this fragment from a Java EE deployment descriptor:
124. beta.html
125. alpha.html And this request from a browser: http://www.sun.com/SCWCDtestApp/register Which statement is correct, when the container receives this request?

options.A: This deployment descriptor is NOT valid.
options.B: The container first looks in the register directory for beta.html.
options.C: The container first looks in the register directory for alpha.html.
options.D: The container first looks for a servlet mapping in the deployment descriptor.
